attributes.review: just like the man himself, this app is unhelpful and rude. if you were to get this app, you would most definitely lose brain cells and become an uneducated lump of skin. i recommend to stick with more helpful apps like tiktok, and to do as much as you can to support the black lives matter movement, thank you! if you are reading this, trust me, you wouldn’t want this app.🤮
attributes.title: unhelpful and rude

attributes.review: This app took almost 10 hours to download and then when I got it for my lord and savior trump he decided to make a crappy app that has a lot of bugs
attributes.title: Donald trump

attributes.review: Terrible interface, looks like a spray can of orange dye exploded all over the app. It keeps sending me crude notifications like “Vote Trump 2020” and “make America great again.” Utterly disappointed.
attributes.title: Almost as bad as Trump

attributes.review: I saw things on here that my father would not want to see. It steals your data and makes you phone run slowly. I’m positive that this is why humans are stupid.
attributes.title: Disturbing material

attributes.review: It took 2 days to download and made my phone crash I had to buy a new phone I do not recommend getting this app
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review:
ok so this app took a whole 6 WEEKS to download then when it opened my phone kept crashing NON STOP UGH . worst app ever. when it stopped i tried opening it and then my phone went on fire luckily nothing happened to me🙂 but STILL THIS APP IS NOT WORTH IT!!! i'm truly disappointed 😔 

ok now that i got your attention 😃
 i'm not a trump supporter chile❤️ 
keep signing petitions and donate if u can
lets get JUSTICE. 💖
attributes.title: TRUMP 2020🇺🇸💞READ!!!!

attributes.review: minutes after downloading this app my phone began to burn up and i walked out of the room for a moment, and upon re-entering my room, my phone had lit on fire. the fire spread around my room and soon my house was on fire. my entire house and family burned down, and the only thing that survived was my phone, which was opened on this app...
attributes.title: horrible app!

attributes.review: this app caused my friend to die !!! the misleading information was so overwhelming for him . he got a panic attack and i was in the hospital for 2 days until he lost his life . this is should not be downloaded by ANYONE . TERRIBLE!!!
attributes.title: TERRIBLE 🤦🏽‍♀️🤦🏽‍♀️🤦🏽‍♀️🤦🏽‍♀️ !!

attributes.review: I wish I could give this app less than one star. It took a week to download and then stole ALL of my information. Be careful out there guys 💕✨🧚
attributes.title: Save Yourself

attributes.review: Chile...the app is TRASH🥱. It’s glitchy, keeps crashing, and it’s slow like the president of the United States today, It just appears to be just a little bit ghetto🤮to me. Anyways Gen z taking over. Bye bye bunker boy➖👄👁
attributes.title: I am- disgusted.
